item.title: Maternal Inputs and Abortion Restrictions
item.description: The Effect of Abortion Restrictions on Birth Rates, Maternal Inputs, and Infant Health with Becca Brough Abstract In this paper we exploit variation in state-level abortion legislation to identify the effect of restrictions on maternal inputs and infant outcomes. We consider four restrictions: requirements for abortion counseling, mandated waiting periods between counseling and abortion procedures, parental involvement laws, and whether public funding for abortion is available through the stateâ€™s Medicaid program.
